scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:clean && concurrently "npm run docs:serve" "npm run docs:watch"
scripts.app:2d:debug: npm run app:2d:clean && webpack serve --config webpack.app.js --mode development --env build=2d
scripts.app:2d:build: npm run app:2d:clean && npm run lint && webpack --config webpack.app.js --mode production --env build=2d
scripts.app:3d:debug: npm run app:3d:clean && webpack serve --config webpack.app.js --mode development --env build=3d
scripts.app:3d:build: npm run app:3d:clean && npm run lint && webpack --config webpack.app.js --mode production --env build=3d
scripts.app:build: npm run app:2d:build & npm run app:3d:build
scripts.aura:2d:build: npm run aura:2d:clean && npm run lint && node ./scripts/publish.js --mode=2d
scripts.aura:3d:build: npm run aura:3d:clean && npm run lint && node ./scripts/publish.js --mode=3d
scripts.aura:build: npm run aura:2d:build & npm run aura:3d:build
scripts.aura:2d:publish: npm run aura:2d:build && cd ./publish/2d && npm publish
scripts.aura:3d:publish: npm run aura:3d:build && cd ./publish/3d && npm publish
scripts.aura:publish: npm run aura:build && cd ./publish/2d && npm publish && cd ../3d && npm publish
